name: Snail Party
description:
Ishmael the Snail was invited to their friend Queequeg's 4th Birthday Party. The only problem is that they live one hectometer apart.

Play as Ishmael as it slooowly makes its way towards Queequeg's, dodging centipedes and eating leaves along the way.

Created a in a few days and submitted to the Slow Game Jam. #slowgame

Follow us on Twitter @Manstersoft
